name: Canberra Cycling Club
description: Canberra Cycling Club is dedicated to promoting cycling as a vital part of our community's social life and health. We provide a variety of events, training sessions, and recreational opportunities for cyclists of all ages and abilities.

content.heading: Welcome to the Canberra Cycling Club
paragraphs: Join a community of passionate cyclists dedicated to inclusivity, performance, and fun. Whether you're a competitive racer or just enjoy weekend rides, thereâ€™s a place for you with us!
Explore our various programs, events, and cycling training that cater to all skill levels.

content.heading: About the Club
paragraphs: Established in 1990, the Canberra Cycling Club has been the heart of cycling in Canberra for over three decades. Our mission is to foster a welcoming environment for cyclists and to promote the benefits of an active lifestyle.
Our club members enjoy exclusive access to training sessions, competitions, and social events while advocating for better cycling infrastructure in our community.

content.heading: Upcoming Events
paragraphs: Join us for our yearly events which include races, social rides, and community outreach programs. Check our calendar for upcoming events.
Whether you're racing or cheering from the sidelines, there's something for everyone!

content.heading: Join Us
paragraphs: Becoming a member of the Canberra Cycling Club opens your door to exclusive benefits, including access to club rides, training resources, and special events.
Membership is available for individuals, families, and juniors, making it easy for everyone to get involved.

content.heading: Get in Touch
paragraphs: Have questions? Weâ€™d love to hear from you! Reach out to us through any of the methods below.

testimonials.name: Sarah Thompson
testimonials.text: Joining the Canberra Cycling Club has changed my life! I've met so many amazing people and improved my cycling skills immensely.

testimonials.name: John Doe
testimonials.text: The community support and encouragement at the club is unrivaled. It's great to see cyclists of all levels come together and share their passion.

services.title: Group Rides
services.description: Join our weekly group rides for various skill levels to improve your cycling and meet fellow enthusiasts.

services.title: Training Programs
services.description: Participate in structured training sessions led by experienced coaches to enhance your performance.

footer.description: Canberra Cycling Club - Growing cycling for a healthier community.
